endpoints.description: Retrieve a list of consumer staples products with detailed ingredient information.
Retrieve detailed information for a specific product identified by its ID.
Compare detailed ingredient and sourcing information between multiple products.
Retrieve a list of product categories.
Retrieve all products belonging to a specific category ID.
List all ingredient sources and their practices.
Retrieve detailed practices and information on a specific source.
Update a report associated with a specific product ID.
Submit user feedback about the service or specific products.
Analyze and retrieve current trends in consumer staples product sourcing and composition.
